Uses of DbAdapterFactory in org.apache.cayenne.dba
 

Fields in org.apache.cayenne.dba declared as DbAdapterFactory
protected  DbAdapterFactory AutoAdapter.adapterFactory
           
 

Methods in org.apache.cayenne.dba that return DbAdapterFactory
protected  DbAdapterFactory AutoAdapter.createDefaultFactory()
          Called from constructor to initialize factory in case no factory was specified by the object creator.
static DbAdapterFactory AutoAdapter.getDefaultFactory()
          Returns a DbAdapterFactory configured to detect all databases officially supported by Cayenne.
 

Methods in org.apache.cayenne.dba with parameters of type DbAdapterFactory
static void AutoAdapter.addFactory(DbAdapterFactory factory)
          Allows application code to add a sniffer to detect a custom adapter.
 

Constructors in org.apache.cayenne.dba with parameters of type DbAdapterFactory
AutoAdapter(DbAdapterFactory adapterFactory, DataSource dataSource)
          Creates an AutoAdapter with specified adapter factory and DataSource.
